Title: Twitches Too
Writer: Dan Berendsen, H.B. Gilmour (characters), Randi Reisfeld (characters)
Actors: Tia Mowry-Hardrict, Tamera Mowry-Housley, Kristen Wilson, Patrick Fabian
Plot: After using their powers to battle the forces of darkness, the sisters settle down to lead normal lives. However, the discovery that their biological father may not be dead, but residing in New York, causes confusion for the pair.
